title: Frontlines:Fuel of War
description: Frontlines: Fuel of War is a military-themed infantry and vehicle based, open-world first person shooter.  The newly formed Red Star Alliance, led by Russia and China, clash with Western Coalition (U.S. & the European Union) forces over increasing energy shortages. This sets the stage for a massive conventional apocalypse pitting the biggest military powers against each other as they try to defend their interests and support their collapsing economies.  Frontlines™: Fuel of War Dedicated Servers will no longer be available for the Microsoft® Xbox 360 after August 31st, 2011. Players can continue to host their own sessions, with a maximum player count of 16.

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Air Support Training Video (HD)
childDownloads.description: Call in devastating air support attacks to move the frontline forward. Visit www.frontlines.com to find out more about the role system in Frontlines: Fuel of War.

childDownloads.title: Drone Technician Training Video (HD)
childDownloads.description: This video features the Drone Technician Role in Frontlines: Fuel of War. A master of robotics, drone technicians have the ability to deploy and control drones for the purpose of reconnaissance, vehicle destruction and all-out assault. Visit www.frontlines.com to find out more about the next generation drone technology in Frontlines: Fuel of War.

childDownloads.title: EMP Tech Training Video (HD)
childDownloads.description: Learn how to use Electromagnetic Pulse weapons to stop drones and tanks in their tracks and knock out helicopters in mid-air. Visit www.frontlines.com to find out more about the role system in Frontlines: Fuel of War.

childDownloads.title: Frontline Combat System Video (HD)
childDownloads.description: Frontlines: Fuel of War video that highlights the Frontline Combat System. The frontline is a series of objectives that players fight for to tip the balance of conflict in their favor. In both single player and multiplayer, players converge on the frontline resulting in strategic choices and intense battles. Visit www.frontlines.com to find out more about this game feature.

childDownloads.title: Frontlines™: 4 Map Pack
childDownloads.description: Kaos Studios presents four all-new multiplayer maps for the hit first-person shooter Frontlines: Fuel of War. From the intense armor engagements of Wide Awake to the massive air battles of Hindsight, this map pack features some of the largest, most wide-open multiplayer levels your XBox 360 has ever seen. Looking for more close-quarters combat?  Then take on the concentrated firefights of Infiltration and the vertical infantry combat of Sunder in two of the most high-intensity maps ever seen in Frontlines: Fuel of War. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Frontlines™: Boneyard Map
childDownloads.description: Join up to 50 players in the first of five all new downloadable maps for Frontlines™: Fuel of War™, featuring the never before seen Automatic Shotgun, Rocket Jeep and Red Star Transport Helicopter.  As Western Coalition armor closes in on the last functional Red Star nuclear missile facility, Alliance tanks rally to defend their last hopes for victory in Europe. The frontlines have been drawn across the Shilnaya Balka missile silos. Coalition and Alliance troops stare each other down across the complex, each waiting for the other to blink. Better watch where you shoot.

childDownloads.title: Frontlines™: Conquer Mode
childDownloads.description: You wanted more. Now you got it.  Available now on Xbox LIVE, Frontlines™: Fuel of War™ Conquer Mode opens up the battleground by allowing players to capture objectives in any order, anywhere on the map. Replay all of your favorite Frontlines maps and discover new strategies and tactics in this free, game mode expansion to the hit first-person shooter rated 9.0 by Official XBOX Magazine.

childDownloads.description: Featuring the weapon loadouts of 2024. Learn about the high tech arsenal in Frontlines: Fuel of War based on real-life weapons in development today. Visit www.frontlines.com to find out more about the weapons in Frontlines: Fuel of War.

childDownloads.title: Gamer Picture Pack #1
childDownloads.description: Download picture pack now. In the year 2024 high tech warfare is waged over depleting global resources and the fate of civilization. Battle with up to 32 players on Kaos dedicated servers utilizing over 60 next-generation weapons and vehicles in open-world environments. The War of the Future Begins Today. Visit www.frontlines.com to find out more about Frontlines: Fuel of War. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
